constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 88 (Thursday, May 20, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GOMEZ:
H.R. 3395.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The Congress enacts this bill pursuant to Clause 1 of
Section 8 of Article 1 of the United States Constitution and
Amendment XVI of the United States Constitution.
[Page H2653]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

title: Home Energy Savings Act
